Hot off the tail of last week's update, here are some fixes for bugs reported by the community.
[h1]Weapons[/h1] [list] [*][b]IAF Medical Gun:[/b] Fixed collision being oriented differently than the visible model. [*][b]CR18 Freeze Grenades:[/b] Fixed collision being oriented differently than the visible model. [*][b]Flashlight Attachment:[/b] Fixed a long-standing issue with this equipment's center of gravity. [*][b]FG01 Hand Grenades:[/b] Fixed collision being oriented differently than the visible model. [*][b]IAF Medical Amplifier Gun:[/b] Fixed collision being oriented differently than the visible model. [*][b]TG-05 Gas Grenades:[/b] Fixed collision being oriented differently than the visible model. [/list]
[h1]Misc[/h1] [list] [*]Fixed doors sometimes surviving a single large hit that dealt more than their max health. [*]Fixed a rare ragdoll-related crash. [*]Fixed a crash when killing aliens without a Steam client connection on a map loaded via console commands. [*]Fixed a crash when leaving the mission settings screen with a dropdown menu open. [*]Fixed a duplicate in-game voting menu being visible during briefing if a briefing camera is in use. [*]Added convar asw_blip_color_parasite_egg for setting the color of unhatched parasites on the minimap. [*]Fixed being unable to join lobbies for certain missions through the game UI. [/list]
[h1]Mapping[/h1] [list] [*]env_sprite_clientside now changes to server-side env_sprite if it has a targetname or parentname defined. A warning is printed to the console if this happens. [/list]
Alien Swarm: Reactive Drop Update - October 27, 2022
